comment: He's the part of Europe that needs to be destroyed one way or another so the rest can be saved.
amr:
# ::snt He's the part of Europe that needs to be destroyed one way or another so the rest can be saved.
(h / he
      :part-of (c / continent
            :name (n / name
                  :op1 "Europe"))
      :ARG0-of (n2 / need-01
            :ARG1 (d / destroy-01
                  :ARG1 c
                  :manner (o / or
                        :op1 (w / way
                              :mod (o2 / one))
                        :op2 (w2 / way
                              :mod (a / another)))
                  :purpose (p / possible-01
                        :ARG1 (s / save-02
                              :ARG1 (r / rest))))))
